title: All Ball - Fizdale Firing; Older College Teams Elevating; Melo Comeback; Listener NBA and College Questions
itunes:title: All Ball - Fizdale Firing; Older College Teams Elevating; Melo Comeback; Listener NBA and College Questions
description:
This week, Gottlieb discusses the Knicks firing of David Fizdale, why it's not surprising, and how college teams are winning with a formula of transfers and older, Non-NBA talent, He also answers listener questions, including Carmelo Anthony's early success in his return in Portland, Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
